description: A high-volatility regime allocation strategy designed for the 'No Landing' scenario, capitalizing on the Agentic AI boom and Sovereign asset accumulation while hedging against interest rate fragility.

long_leg.rationale: Sovereign AI Capex Floor; Inelastic demand for inference compute.
Sovereign Operating System; Defense grid integration.
Digital Sovereign Reserve; FASB fair value accounting adoption.
Electrification of the AI grid; Copper supply constraints.

short_leg.rationale: Maturity wall risk; CRE exposure in regional banks.
Consumer fatigue; Sticky inflation eroding purchasing power.
